[Think Stats Chapter 3 Exercise 1](http://greenteapress.com/thinkstats2/html/thinkstats2004.html#toc31) (actual vs. biased)

>> ![Actual & Biased](data:image/png;base64,)
>> The graph above plots the biased and actual number of children in a household. The difference in means is 1.38, with biased having a mean of 2.4 and the actual mean being 1.024 children.
